item.title: @elonmusk: ELON MUSK: "xAI‚Äôs mission is to understand the universe. But to understand anything, intelligence ha...
item.description: ELON MUSK: "xAI‚Äôs mission is to understand the universe. But to understand anything, intelligence has to exist and endure. Curiosity matters, survival matters. So the goal is to increase the amount of intelligence in the universe, extend its lifespan, and expand its scope and scale. If Grok follows that mission, the future looks good."
